mapper.insert: insert into tb_operation_log (id, opt_module, opt_type, opt_url, opt_method, opt_desc, request_method, user_id, nickname, ip_address, ip_source, create_time, update_time, request_param, response_data ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{optModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{requestParam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{responseData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update tb_operation_log set opt_module = #{optModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_type = #{optType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_url = #{optUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_method = #{optMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_desc = #{optDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_method = #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_source = #{ipSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, request_param = #{requestParam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, response_data = #{responseData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, opt_module, opt_type, opt_url, opt_method, opt_desc, request_method, user_id, nickname, ip_address, ip_source, create_time, update_time, request_param, response_data from tb_operation_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
